titles.title: To amend the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 to establish an Office for Under-Banked, Un-Banked, and Underserved Consumers, and for other purposes.
Improving Access to Traditional Banking Act of 2019
Improving Access to Traditional Banking Act of 2019
Improving Access to Traditional Banking Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Improving Access to Traditional Banking Act of 2019
This bill establishes in the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau the Office for Under-Banked, Un-Banked, and Underserved Consumers. The office must, in part (1) report on impeding factors for individuals and families that do not participate in the banking system, and (2) develop strategies to increase such participation.
